root.name: Tomb Raider: Chronicles
root.description: OverviewTomb Raider: Chronicles is the fifth game in Eidos' popular Tomb Raider video game series. The game serves as a series of different adventures in Lara's past, since she was killed in the previous game, Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation.PC RequirementsWindows 95/98/Me/XP (Home Edition);Pentium II 266 MHz (Min.);4x CD-ROM drive;16 MB RAM (Min.), 32 MB (Rec.);DirectX 7 compatible graphics card;DirectX 7 compatible sound card.
